titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2021 as "Mental Health Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2021 as "Mental Health Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Mental Health Awareness Month and declares mental health a national priority.
